title: 'Have flagged concerns': India on US H-1B visa chaos; notes 'hardships' for families
content: India has raised concerns with the US over the abrupt cancellation of pre-scheduled H-1B visa interviews for thousands of Indian applicants. These interviews, postponed for enhanced social media vetting, have caused significant delays and hardships for skilled workers unable to return to their jobs in the US.

title: Pragg, Giri or Nakamura? Rapport reveals his pick for Candidates | Exclusive
content: Hungarian GM Richárd Rapport shared insights on the upcoming 2026 Candidates Tournament in Cyprus, saying experience will play a key role. He noted that veterans like Hikaru Nakamura and Fabiano Caruana may play tight games against each other, while decisive results often come against struggling players. Rapport added that lower-seeded players can still create surprises in the round-robin format.

title: 'I want Pak': Rajnath recalls Vajpayee's unmatched wit; all about iconic moment
content: Defence Minister Rajnath Singh shared a witty anecdote about former PM Atal Bihari Vajpayee's response to a Pakistani reporter's marriage proposal.  During a Lahore visit, she offered marriage in exchange for Jammu and Kashmir as 'Mehr'. Vajpayee humorously countered, stating he'd marry her if Pakistan was given as dowry, drawing laughter and applause

title: Jobs in AI: Mark Cuban to new grads; join small companies, teach AI agents
content: Shark Tank star Mark Cuban advises fresh graduates to bypass large corporations and join small and medium-sized businesses. He believes new talent can significantly boost these smaller firms by teaching them to leverage AI agents for process optimization, a valuable contribution big companies don't require.  Cuban highlights this as an inexpensive way for SMBs to gain immediate AI-driven results.

title: Boozeball or Bazball? The hangover of wannabe cricket Ultras reduced to ashes
content: Bazball arrived in Australia preaching fearlessness and fun, but will leave exposed by one of Test cricket’s harshest conditions. Amid losses, off-field indulgence and mounting criticism, England’s cult-like philosophy has lost its aura of credibility. As Australia dismantle method and mindset alike, Bazball’s greatest challenge now isn’t survival -- it’s relevance under pressure.

title: 'Unremitting hostility': India raps B'desh over lynching of 2nd Hindu man; warns Yunus govt
content: India's Ministry of External Affairs has strongly condemned the recent violence against minorities in Bangladesh, including the killing of a Hindu man. The MEA stated that over 2,900 incidents against minorities have been documented, dismissing claims of media exaggeration or political violence.

title: Deja vu, India edition: 10 headlines that remained the same in 2025
content: As 2025 concludes, India witnessed recurring themes: the BJP's continued dominance, the Congress's struggle to revive, persistent air pollution in Delhi, and Pakistan-linked terror. Misogynistic remarks by politicians, language debates, and name-changing initiatives also remained prominent. Cricket stars faced retirement speculation, while the rupee's slide and the perennial 'when will you marry?' question for public figures persisted.

title: Google CEO shares AI-made Xmas photo: Elon Musk reacts; post goes viral
content: Google CEO Sundar Pichai's AI-generated Christmas greeting featuring himself and his dog, Jeffree, in a custom snow globe image, garnered significant attention on X.

title: Bangladesh Premier League: Not enough balls! Coach walks out of training session
content: Khaled Mahmud walked out of Noakhali Express’s training ahead of the BPL opener, unhappy with team management and poor facilities. Pace coach Talha joined him after a reported argument over a lack of practice balls and alleged misbehaviour by the owner. Both later returned after being convinced, as BPL officials criticised the franchise’s unprofessional conduct.

title: 4 skills that will decide who survives the workplace battle in 2026
content: As workplaces evolve rapidly, employers are focusing less on degrees and more on everyday skills. By 2026, adaptability, data understanding, digital comfort, collaboration, and emotional intelligence will shape career growth. Professionals who can adjust to change, work well with others, and manage emotions are more likely to stay relevant in fast-moving work environments.

title: GTA 6 delay: Ex Rockstar developer warns; fans may ‘stop caring’ if launch postponed again
content: Former Rockstar developer Mike York warns that further delays to Grand Theft Auto 6 could kill public interest. He believes Rockstar is meticulously polishing the game to meet immense expectations, but prolonged waits risk alienating fans.  York anticipates a November 2026 release, citing it as an optimal period for sales ahead of the holiday season.

title: LeBron James gifts daughter a mini house in viral 'goat father' clip
content: NBA legend LeBron James recently delighted fans with a viral throwback video of his daughter, Zhuri Nova James, enjoying a custom-built mini mansion he once gifted her for her birthday. The thoughtful gift, mirroring their own home, showcased James's loving fatherhood and his ability to balance a legendary career with family life. Fans praised the sweet gesture, highlighting the strong bond between the father and the daughter.

title: This is the perfect age gap for happy and long-lasting relationships, according to science
content: Research indicates a 'sweet spot' for age gaps in long-lasting relationships, with zero to three years showing the highest satisfaction. While larger gaps can present challenges, successful couples prioritize open communication, shared values, love, and respect to navigate differences and maintain happiness.

title: Taylor Swift emotional as Travis Kelce calls her the ‘love of my life’
content: Taylor Swift's docuseries 'End of an Era' has fans emotional, particularly with a moment in the final episode. Travis Kelce sent Swift a heartfelt bouquet and letter during the last leg of 'The Eras Tour,' calling her 'the love of my life' and recalling their first meeting in Kansas City. The touching gesture has resonated widely on social media.

title: VHT: Scare in Jaipur- KKR batter and Rohit Sharma’s team-mate suffers serious injury
content: Mumbai batter Angkrish Raghuvanshi was hospitalized after a serious head injury during a Vijay Hazare Trophy match in Jaipur. The 21-year-old, also an IPL player, was stretchered off, causing concern. Earlier, Mumbai posted 331/7, with strong contributions from Musheer Khan, Sarfaraz Khan, and Hardik Tamore. Rohit Sharma was dismissed for a duck.

title: Robert Kraft vs Gayle Benson net worth: How their finances compare
content: NFL titans Robert Kraft and Gayle Benson, both billionaires, showcase contrasting paths to sports ownership. Kraft built a vast empire through diverse investments before acquiring the Patriots, while Benson inherited and expanded her late husband's franchises, the Saints and Pelicans. Their financial journeys highlight distinct strategies for wealth accumulation and franchise management.

title: VHT: 'Fast-track him now'- Ex-India captain compares Suryavanshi to Tendulkar
content: Former India opener Krishnamachari Srikkanth is urging selectors to fast-track teenage sensation Vaibhav Sooryavanshi into the senior Indian team. Citing Suryavanshi's maturity, technique, and dominance across age-group and domestic cricket, Srikkanth compares his rapid rise to Sachin Tendulkar's early career, advocating for bold backing of rare talent.

title: 6 shots fired: AMU teacher’s killers kept shooting him in head; murder caught on CCTV
content: Disturbing CCTV footage reveals the execution-style killing of computer teacher Rau Danish Ali on the AMU campus. Attackers lingered, firing repeatedly at the victim's head even after he collapsed. The cold-blooded crime, captured on video, shows the assailants ensuring Ali's death before fleeing on a scooter.

title: CBSE issues SOP to prevent dog-bite incidents and manage stray dogs across school premises
content: CBSE has issued an advisory asking affiliated schools to implement a Standard Operating Procedure to prevent dog-bite incidents and manage stray dogs on school campuses. Following Supreme Court directions, schools must conduct awareness sessions, secure premises, remove stray dogs with help from authorities, appoint nodal officers, ensure regular inspections, improve waste management under PM POSHAN guidelines, and support MoHFW rabies elimination efforts.

title: From foot to head: How Chinese doctors kept a severed ear alive; reattached it months later
content: In a remarkable feat of reconstructive surgery, Chinese doctors successfully grafted a woman's severed ear onto her foot to preserve it. After a severe workplace accident, the ear was reattached to her head following extensive scalp reconstruction. This innovative procedure highlights China's history of pioneering, unconventional medical interventions for severe injuries.

title: The Rs 40 shot: Inside cough syrup racket hooking teens across states; 78 arrested in UP
content: A vast illicit economy fueled by codeine-based cough syrups is thriving across East UP and beyond, preying on youth and laborers. Investigations reveal a multi-crore racket involving diversion from legal channels, with kingpins orchestrating a complex smuggling network. Authorities are intensifying crackdowns, with multiple arrests and probes underway.

title: UGC NET December 2025 city intimation slip: NTA issues important notice; details here
content: The National Testing Agency has issued a notice for UGC-NET December 2025 candidates regarding the City Intimation Slip. Candidates are warned against using CSIR-NET links, as doing so may cause technical issues. The City Intimation Slip must be downloaded only from the official UGC-NET portal. Candidates are advised to use correct login details, follow official instructions, and contact NTA support if needed.

title: World Rapid & Blitz: ‘Not great’ - Carlsen on relations with FIDE
content: Magnus Carlsen has returned for the 2025 FIDE World Rapid & Blitz Championships in Doha, held from December 26 to 30 with a €1 million prize fund. The world number one said personal and family ties with the Qatar organisers were central to his decision. His relationship with FIDE remains strained after last year’s “jeansgate” controversy.

title: Prodigy to national honour: Sooryavanshi conferred with PM Rashtriya Bal Puraskar – Watch
content: Young batting prodigy Vaibhav Sooryavanshi, just 14, has been honored with the Pradhan Mantri Rashtriya Bal Puraskar. His remarkable year includes an IPL contract, a 58-ball century for India U19, and breaking multiple records in T20 and List A cricket, including the fastest IPL hundred and fastest youth ODI century.  His meteoric rise continues to captivate the nation.

title: Sleep disorders in cancer patients: Causes, effects and ways to improve rest
content: Cancer patients frequently battle sleep disorders, impacting their recovery and well-being. Tumours, treatments like chemotherapy, and emotional stress disrupt sleep, leading to fatigue and anxiety. Insomnia is common, but other issues like sleep apnoea can also arise. Addressing these sleep problems is crucial for improving a patient's quality of life and treatment adherence.

title: BJP scripts history in Kerala: VV Rajesh elected Thiruvananthapuram mayor
content: VV Rajesh made history as the first BJP Mayor of Thiruvananthapuram Corporation, winning with 51 votes. He garnered support from 50 BJP councillors and one independent. The UDF candidate received 17 votes, and the LDF candidate secured 29 votes in the election.

title: UP police brutality: Farmer hung upside down, legs broken
content: A farmer in Agra was allegedly subjected to brutal custodial torture, including being hung upside down and severely beaten, resulting in fractured legs. The State Human Rights Commission has registered a case, and a parallel probe is underway. Three police personnel have been suspended, and an ACP removed for negligence.

title: Govt bans certain substances in incense sticks; flags 'potential impact on health'
content: India has introduced a new quality standard for incense sticks (agarbatti), banning harmful insecticidal chemicals and synthetic fragrance intermediates. Developed by BIS, this aims to ensure safer products, promote sustainability, and boost consumer confidence. The move supports the nation's significant agarbatti industry, a major employer, and enhances its global market access.

title: Duck for Rohit, 77 for Kohli: Fans endure a rollercoaster day at Vijay Hazare Trophy
content: Rohit Sharma suffered a golden duck in the Vijay Hazare Trophy against Uttarakhand, while Virat Kohli impressed with a rapid 77 for Delhi against Gujarat. This contrast reflects their recent ODI performances, with Kohli in exceptional form and Rohit also maintaining strong scoring.

title: Clavicular breaks silence, claims self-defence after Cybertruck livestream incident
content: A controversial livestream featuring streamer Clavicular has sparked outrage after footage showed his Tesla Cybertruck moving forward with a person on its hood on Christmas Eve. Clavicular claims fear drove his actions, alleging he believed individuals surrounding his vehicle were armed. The incident has raised serious questions about online accountability and real-world danger.

title: 'Just a junta with nuclear weapons': When Bush and Putin discussed Pakistan in 2005
content: Declassified US-Russia documents reveal Presidents Bush and Putin expressed shared "nervousness" over Pakistan's nuclear program and its links to Iran and North Korea. Discussions highlighted concerns about the AQ Khan network and the risk of sensitive technology falling into the wrong hands, underscoring longstanding international anxieties about Pakistan's nuclear command and control.

title: Watch: Man bursts firecrackers from moving car on Hyderabad expressway
content: A man was filmed launching sky shot firecrackers from a moving car on Hyderabad's PVNR Expressway, sparking safety concerns. Separately, a builder in Surat was arrested for stopping traffic to set off fireworks in celebration of his son's birthday, causing commuter disruption.

title: Could global warming paradoxically freeze the planet
content: Ancient oceans, driven by microscopic life, once pulled vast amounts of carbon from the atmosphere, leading to dramatic cooling and ice ages.  This biological pump, fueled by plankton, highlights how marine ecosystems can profoundly reshape global climate.  Today's changing oceans may trigger similar, unpredictable shifts, underscoring life's power to alter planetary conditions.

title: Ashes: Twenty wickets fall on wild opening day - Boxing Day test explodes into chaos
content: A dramatic opening day at the MCG saw 20 wickets fall as Australia were bowled out for 152, with Josh Tongue taking 5 wickets. England then collapsed to 110 all out, with Mitchell Starc and Michael Neser taking multiple wickets. Australia finished the day on 4/0, holding a slender lead.

title: 'Your mother will die today’: Man sets wife ablaze in front of children; accused her of infidelity
content: A shocking incident unfolded in Hyderabad as a 26-year-old woman was allegedly burnt alive by her husband. The victim, Chityala Triveni, succumbed to her injuries after being doused with petrol and set ablaze by her husband, K Venkatesh, who reportedly accused her of infidelity. The accused has been arrested, and the couple's children provided harrowing accounts to investigators.

title: Ranveer starrer nears Rs. 635 Cr as Kartik's rom-com slumps
content: Aditya Dhar’s 'Dhurandhar' continues its historic box office dominance, crossing Rs. 634.3 crore by Day 22. Despite the Christmas holiday, Kartik Aaryan’s 'Tu Meri Main Tera Main Tera Tu Meri' struggled significantly, earning only Rs. 7.39 crore in two days due to limited screen allocation and the overwhelming popularity of the Ranveer Singh-starrer.

title: Why South Korea is paying its citizens to date, marry, and have children
content: South Korea is now paying citizens to date, marry, and have children due to a severe relationship crisis and declining birth rates. Local governments offer cash incentives, with some regions providing up to INR 12-13 lakh for marriage. However, experts question if financial aid alone can revive relationships amidst work stress and economic pressures.

title: ‘Drew salary while residing abroad’: UK-based Islamic preacher under ED lens; radical ideology charge
content: The Enforcement Directorate has launched a money laundering investigation against Islamic preacher Maulana Shamshul Huda Khan, based on an FIR by the UP Anti-terrorism squad. Khan, now a UK citizen, allegedly drew a government salary from 2013-2017 while living abroad and acquired properties worth over Rs 30 crore.

title: How to link your PAN with Aadhaar before Dec 31, 2025; step-by-step guide
content: PAN-Aadhaar linking deadline nears: Link your PAN with Aadhaar by December 31, 2025, or face consequences. Unlinked PANs become inoperative from January 1, 2026, impacting tax refunds and leading to higher TDS.

title: Who was Shivank Avasthi, Indian-origin student shot dead in Canada?
content: Tragedy struck near the University of Toronto Scarborough campus as 20-year-old Indian-origin PhD student Shivank Avasthi was fatally shot on December 23, 2025. Toronto Police confirmed the incident as a homicide, with investigations ongoing and no motive yet established. The Indian Embassy expressed deep anguish, offering assistance to the bereaved family and highlighting concerns for international student safety.

title: 'Demanded Rs 60 lakh': Man accused in Pocso case dies by suicide; family alleges blackmail
content: A 26-year-old engineer, facing a POCSO case, died by alleged suicide in Gwalior. His family claims he was being blackmailed for Rs 60 lakh to settle the case involving a minor, with Rs 30 lakh already paid. They accuse the complainant's lawyer of threats, stating the immense pressure led to his depression and death.

title: Sources: U-M targeting Utes legend Wittingham
content: Utah coach Kyle Whittingham has emerged as the focus of Michigan's coaching search, sources told ESPN.

title: Jokic's 56-point triple-double lifts Nuggets in OT
content: Nikola Jokic recorded a 56-point triple-double and set an NBA record with 18 points in overtime, leading the Nuggets to a 142-138 win over the Timberwolves.

title: Vikes dominate Lions despite woeful passing game
content: The Vikings accomplished the rare feat of winning an NFL game while finishing with fewer than 10 net passing yards.

title: Redick rips into Lakers: 'We don't care enough'
content: Lakers coach JJ Redick lit into his team after a blowout loss to the Rockets, saying it doesn't care enough and that next practice will be "uncomfortable."

title: Kelce emotional after season finale at Arrowhead
content: The Kansas City Chiefs' loss to the Denver Broncos on Thursday might have marked Travis Kelce's final appearance at Arrowhead Stadium, though the star tight end remained noncommittal about his future following the game.

title: Lions' playoff chances end with loss: 'It sucks'
content: The Lions officially fell out of playoff contention with a 23-10 loss to the Vikings, leaving Detroit to evaluate how it needs to improve.

title: Dak's 'pride' has him planning to play final game
content: Dak Prescott reiterated after Thursday's win that he wants to play in next week's season finale versus the Giants, citing his pride in not finishing below .500 as a team.

title: Sources: Soderstrom, A's agree to $86M deal
content: Left fielder Tyler Soderstrom and the A's are in agreement on a seven-year, $86 million contract with a club option for an eighth season and escalators that can max out at $131 million, sources told ESPN.

title: Reasons for optimism and pessimism for all 10 NBA teams that played on Christmas
content: ESPN analyst Zach Kram picks two stats for the teams that played on Dec. 25, and breaks down why fans should be happy and worried about their title aspirations.

title: Our guide to every Week 17 NFL game: Matchup previews, predictions and what's at stake
content: Seahawks vs. Panthers? Hurts vs. Allen? Picks, predictions, stats and what's at stake for every remaining Week 17 game.

title: 'Is it a real functional toaster?': Behind the scramble to engineer the Pop-Tarts Bowl trophy
content: How the internet's favorite bowl took things to the next level by making its trophy a kitchen appliance.

title: A reason (or two) to watch every one of this year's bowl games
content: With first-year success stories, chances at redemption and general silliness, bowl season always delivers.

title: Ranking the biggest MLB Christmas week moves
content: Who says the offseason slows down for the holidays? Let's remember some free agent signings and trades.

title: Tracking the NFL playoff picture: Updated chances to clinch open spots, win division titles
content: We are following the 2025 NFL season's playoff picture. Here's how things look right now for wild-card spots, division races and even the draft order.

title: How much is each position in soccer worth? A deep dive into the Premier League
content: The Premier League's January transfer window is close, and we started wondering: What position on the field is *really* worth the most?

title: 36 NFL rookies reveal the one big lesson they learned this season
content: Tyler Shough, Isaac TeSlaa and Jalon Walker were among the 36 rookies who learned how humbling and challenging the NFL can be.

title: 'Mr. Eligible': The growing fraternity of NFL sixth offensive linemen
content: NFL teams are using sixth O-linemen in more plays this season, and we're highlighting, yep -- six of them.

title: What's new heading into second season of TGL
content: From signature holes to a bigger and better putting green, the TGL is ready for the start of the 2026 season.

title: World Junior Championship guide: Top contenders, key players to watch
content: The tournament starts Thursday, with the best under-20 players in hockey. Here are gold medal favorites, players set to break out.

title: The NHL's best this week: Is Craig Berube on the hot seat in Toronto?
content: As the holiday break approaches, the Maple Leafs aren't exactly excelling. Plus, key games in the week ahead.

title: The Playbook: Shadow Reports, lineup locks for Christmas Day and all of Week 17
content: An all-encompassing look at the matchups to exploit or avoid and lineup locks in fantasy, as well as projected scores for all NFL games.

title: NBA Power Rankings: Young risers to watch on all 30 teams
content: From ROY and MIP races, our NBA insiders break down all 30 teams' young riser in this week's Power Rankings.

title: The 50 best women's soccer players in the world for 2025, ranked!
content: Here are the 50 best women's soccer players in the world for 2025, as ranked by an expert panel of coaches, GMs and journalists.

title: Transfer rumors, news: Man United want Gallagher loan, Atlético want €30m
content: Atlético Madrid midfielder Conor Gallagher is the subject of interest from Manchester United. Transfer Talk has the latest news and rumors.

title: A miracle child, a priceless penny and a racing legend
content: Back in 1998, long before the United States stopped producing the penny, a little girl with spina bifida gave Dale Earnhardt a gift that raises the question: What if pennies are actually worth everything?

content: At TOI World Desk, our dedicated team of seasoned journalists and passionate writers tirelessly sifts through the vast tapestry of global events to bring you the latest news and diverse perspectives round the clock. Join us on a journey across continents as we unravel the stories that shape our interconnected world. Read More

title: "Being Attacked Because We Are Hindus": NDTV's Ground Report From Bangladesh
content: Hindus in Bangladesh's troubled capital Dhaka in an exclusive conversation with NDTV's Ankit Tyagi, who is at ground zero, narrated the horrors they faced and concerns they have as attacks on them by radical Islamists.

title: Opinion: Opinion | Jana Nayagan vs. Parasakthi: The Politics Playing Out On Tamil Nadu's Screens
content: This is not merely a contest between two films; it is a proxy battle for political space, symbolism, and supremacy.

title: 8 Killed, 18 Injured In Bombing At Mosque In Syria During Friday Prayers
content: An explosion hit worshippers at a mosque in a predominantly Alawite area of Syria's Homs on Friday, state media said, killing at least eight in the latest attack on the minority community.

title: Boy, 10, Delivered Tea, Lassi To Soldiers During Op Sindoor, Gets Bal Puraskar
content: He is 10 years old, but showed a big heart. Shravan Singh, amidst the risks associated with war during Operation Sindoor, regularly delivered water, milk, and lassi to the Indian soldiers stationed at the border near his home in Punjab's Ferozepur.

title: Video: Wild Boar Mauls Forest Officer, Strikes With Sticks Don't Help
content: A forest department officer was injured after a wild boar attacked him during a rescue operation in Uttar Pradesh's Badaun district on Friday.

title: Opinion: Blog | Rahul vs Priyanka? Not Really
content: The rumours about apower struggle within the Congress may just be that: rumours. For now, there is no vacancy in the Congress.

title: 15 Injured In Stabbing, "Unspecified Liquid" Attack In Japan's Mishima
content: Fourteen people were hospitalised after a stabbing attack in a factory in central Japan, when an unspecified liquid was also sprayed, local media reported.

title: UP Official Threatens To Jump Off Bridge If Contractor Misses Deadline
content: The video of an overbridge inspection in Uttar Pradesh's Lalitpur has gone viral after a senior official was seen threatening to jump off the bridge if the contractor failed to complete the construction by mid-January.

title: India's "Commitment" On Lalit Modi, Vijay Mallya's "Biggest Fugitives" Video
content: Responding tangentially to the taunt by Lalit Modi, who said he and Vijay Mallya were the "two biggest fugitives" of India, the MEA has said anyone wanted by the law will be brought back to the country so that they can "face trial".

title: What Tarique Rahman's Return To Bangladesh Means For India
content: A lawyer aligned with the pro-Pakistan Jamaat-E-Islami Bangladesh has issued a death threat to Tarique Rahman, just hours after the Bangladesh Nationalist Party leader landed in the country after 17 years in exile.

title: Bangladesh Unrest News Live: Why Second Hindu Man Was Lynched In Bangladesh
content: Bangladesh Crisis LIVE: Another Hindu man has been beaten to death in Bangladesh, days after Dipu Chandra Das was lynched and his body was set ablaze, local media reported on Thursday.

title: On Camera, Man Attempts Suicide From Mecca's Grand Mosque. How He Was Saved
content: A suicide attempt at Masjid al-Haram in Makkah was prevented after a member of the mosque's security forces stepped in, sustaining injuries while trying to stop the man from jumping from an upper level.

title: Anti-India Protests At Dhaka University: NDTV Reports From Ground Zero
content: Fresh anti-India protests have erupted in Dhaka as Bangladesh remains tense ahead of February general elections. Anti-India slogans were raised at a massive procession after the Friday prayers at Dhaka University, reports NDTV's Ankit Tyagi.

title: UP Man Kills Wife Over 'Secret' Phone, Buries Body 'Drishyam'-Style
content: A man killed his wife for secretly using a mobile phone and then buried her body in a pit behind their house in Uttar Pradesh's Gorakhpur. The man misled the police by telling them that his wife died by suicide.

title: Massive International 'SIM Box Tech' Cyber Fraud Busted In Andhra Pradesh
content: A massive international cyberfraud network that used 'SIM box technology' to rob people has been busted by the Andhra Pradesh cyber crime police.

title: Congress Slams Assam Government Over Nalbari Christmas Market Vandalism
content: Leader of the Opposition in the Assam Legislative Assembly and senior Congress leader Debabrata Saikia on Friday strongly condemned the vandalism of Christmas markets in Nalbari allegedly by Bajrang Dal members.

title: Saudi Arabia Sees First Snowfall In 3 Decades, Iceland Records 20 Degree Celsius
content: The people of Saudi Arabia woke up to a winter wonderland as snow covered parts of the kingdom for the first time in nearly three decades.

title: Accountant Carrying Rs 85 Lakh On Scooter Robbed On Delhi-Lucknow Highway
content: A ride on a highway turned traumatising for a man after bike-borne robbers snatched away his bag containing Rs 85 lakh in office cash. The incident, which took place on the Delhi-Lucknow highway, was caught on camera.

title: Indian Student, 20, Shot Dead Near Toronto University, Accused On The Run
content: Shivank Avasthi was found with a gunshot wound on Tuesday, in what the police said was Toronto's 41st homicide case this year.

title: Transfer window preview: What do Europe's big clubs need?
content: the transfer window opens in early January across the premier league , german Bundesliga , French Ligue 1 , Spanish LaLiga and Italian Serie A . but clubs have been busy planning their business for months . arsenal's summer spend was so comprehensive that they now have the best squad depth in England .

title: NFL playoff-clinching scenarios: What's at stake for nine teams in Week 17?
content: eight more teams punched their ticket into the postseason during week 16 of 2025 . 10 of 14 teams have qualified for the playoffs with two weeks to go . five AFC teams and four NFC teams have a chance to secure something this week .

title: Doncic, Reaves and the hilarious bromance fueling the Lakers' wild start
content: the 8,000-sQUARE-FOOT Manhattan Beach mansion was designed with a minimalist motif . the five-bedroom home was built from tennis star Maria Sharapova . it features a premium man cave amenity that doubles as an irresistible lure for competition junkies .

title: Will your team make the playoffs? Simulate the rest of the regular season

title: Can Jalen Hurts or Josh Allen break the career rushing TD record?
content: the Philadelphia Eagles host the Buffalo Bills at the etihad stadium on tuesday . the game features two of the most prolific rushing quarterbacks of all time . if their bodies cooperate and the stars align, what they're capable of achieving would be epic .

title: Why believe in Tyler Shough, Malik Willis and other unlikely playoff starters?
content: a new year threatens to begin before you've processed the entirety of the one that you're still navigating . the month of December rolled out at an excruciating pace . there are a variety of pocketed countdown calendars replete with surprises like chocolates or crystals .

title: One stat that will make or break 2026 for all 15 NL teams
content: we're going to pick one stat from the 2025 season for each MLB team . we'll start with the national league and then return with the American League . 17 different pitchers recorded a save for the Diamondbacks .

title: 🎁 KAT proposes to girlfriend Jordyn Woods
content: the new york Knicks center proposed to his longtime girlfriend, the couple announced . the couple have been dating since 2020, officially announcing their relationship in September of that year . a post shared by jordynwoods shared the post on their Instagram stories .

title: 'If I don’t get this right, my career is over': How Penn State landed on Matt Campbell as its next coach
content: Matt Campbell is new coach for the first time in 58 days as head coach . the 46-year-old had become Iowa State's all-time coaching wins leader . he had spent much of his childhood following Nittany Lions football while visiting grandparents .

title: Week 17 buzz: What we're hearing on Burrow, the red-hot Jaguars and Pro Bowl rosters
content: insiders Jeremy Fowler and Dan Graziano have been calling sources around the NFL for the latest news and buzz on key situations heading into Week 17 . Jeremy and Dan poked around on the Jaguars, who are in the middle of a six-game win streak . they also gathered reaction to pro Bowl rosters .

title: How Alonso's start compares to Real Madrid coaches Mourinho, Ancelotti, Zidane
content: Xabi Alonso had just beaten sevilla 2-0 in the Copa del Rey on saturday . he had a point to make before his final news conference of 2025 . the implication going into the league's festive holiday was: Don't worry about me. I'm not going anywhere. See you in January .

title: Snap reactions to every Week 17 game: Broncos stay in control of AFC destiny; Cowboys, Vikings win
content: the Broncos are 20-13 ahead of the Chiefs . the Vikings beat the Lions in the playoffs on christmas day . their hopes of earning the AFC's top seed alive have been reacted to the action .

title: ISKCON plans to hold grand Vaikunta Ekadasi celebrations on Tuesday
content: Darshan will be available for the public from 9 a.m. to 9 p.m.; elaborate arrangements have been made for vehicle parking

title: Roll back fare hike, SUCI(C) urges Railways
content: Socialist Unity Centre of India (Communist) members stage a demonstration in front of Dharwad Railway Station

title: Punjab and Haryana HC reduces man's death penalty in minor's rape, murder
content: Acquitting the mother, the HC observed there is no IPC section to punish her for "trying to protect her Raja beta"

title: Kalyana Karnataka issues sidelined during Winter Session, says MLC
content: Shashil Namoshi points out at the stated agenda that the Winter Session was meant to address the concerns of North Karnataka

title: Vizag-based commerce platform offers instant cashback on purchases from local stores
content: ‘Payzo’ enables users to discover nearby stores, make payments, and earn cashback on everyday purchases, say founders Shankar and Vyshnavi Chenna

title: Drunk driver drags motorcycle for half a kilometre in serial accident on ORR
content: According to the FIR, the incident occurred around 7.15 p.m. on Wednesday (December 24) near the Sumanahalli flyover, when Rohith was returning home

title: Congress alleges corruption, administrative failure in BMC; releases 'chargesheet'
content: Mumbai Congress president Varsha Gaikwad claimed that the BMC, which has been without elected representatives for more than three years, has failed to ensure transparency and accountability in governance

title: BNP’s Tarique Rahman visits his father’s grave 17 years after return from self-exile
content: The 60-year-old Bangladesh Nationalist Party (BNP) acting chairman returned to the country on December 25, 2025 after living in London since 2008

title: Kannada Cinema Roundtable 2025: ‘We should tell more rooted and original stories’
content: As we wrap up 2025, The Hindu caught up with some of the best artistes from the Kannada film industry of the year for an insightful discussion.

title: Delhi court grants bail to six accused in India Gate protest case over ‘Maoist slogans’
content: The protest took place at the India Gate on November 23, during which some agitators were accused of raising pro-Hidma slogans and using pepper spray on the police trying to contain them

title: India imposes anti-dumping duty on two Chinese products
content: These duties were imposed as these products — cold-rolled non-oriented electrical steel, and 1,1,1,2-Tetrafluoroethane or R-134a — were exported to India from China at below normal prices

title: India conveys concern to U.S. over cancellation of H1B visa interviews
content: The interviews of thousands of H-1B visa applicants slated from the middle of this month in India have been abruptly postponed by several months to scrutinise their social media posts and online profile

title: After backlash, BIAL increases free parking duration at T1 arrivals at Bengaluru airport
content: Beyond the free waiting period, cab operators will be charged ₹100 for the first 30 minutes, followed by ₹50 for each additional hour

title: Unremitting hostilities against minorities in Bangladesh matter of grave concern: India
content: Over 2,900 incidents of violence against minorities have been documented in Bangladesh by independent sources during the tenure of interim government, he noted

title: Kacheguda-Yesvantpur Vande Bharat Express to halt at Hindupur on trial basis from December 27
content: The trial stoppage is aimed at improving rail connectivity and offering faster, more convenient travel options for passengers in the Hindupur region

title: Salem West MLA R. Arul lodges complaint against PMK leader Anbumani
content: His complaint comes in response to another complaint lodged by the Anbumani faction against the proposed general council and executive committee meeting of the party to be convened by Dr. Ramadoss in Salem on Monday (December 29, 2025).

title: Drone patrolling across Sathya Sai district from January 1, says Superintendent of Police
content: Drone surveillance will be useful to effectively control crime and the offenders will also be punished as the recorded footage will act as an evidence, the SP said

title: Ex-MNS leader Prakash Mahajan joins Shiv Sena
content: Prakash Mahajan, the brother of late BJP leader Pramod Mahajan, had been associated with Raj Thackeray-led MNS since its formation in 2006, but quit the party earlier this year due to differences with its leadership

title: Stampedes, fires and plane crash: A list of major tragedies India witnessed in 2025
content: The country also faced two major terror attacks including the car blast near Delhi’s Red Fort and the Pahalgam attack which led to a military confrontation with Pakistan via ‘Operation Sindoor’

title: BJP leader V.V. Rajesh sworn in as Mayor of Thiruvananthapuram
content: Mr. Rajesh got 51 out of the total 100 votes, LDF’s Mayoral candidate R.P. Sivaji got 29 votes, while UDF’s K.S. Sabarinadhan got only 17 votes

title: California floods: Southern region ravaged by storm — videos show widespread damage
content: At TOI World Desk, our dedicated team of seasoned journalists and passionate writers tirelessly sifts through the vast tapestry of global events to bring you the latest news and diverse perspectives round the clock. With an unwavering commitment to accuracy, depth, and timeliness, we strive to keep you informed about the ever-evolving world, delivering a nuanced understanding of international affairs to our readers. Join us on a journey across continents as we unravel the stories that shape our interconnected world. Read More

title: 'Committed to bring back fugitives': MEA on Lalit Modi, Mallya; reaction after viral video
content: The TOI News Desk comprises a dedicated and tireless team of journalists who operate around the clock to deliver the most current and comprehensive news and updates to the readers of The Times of India worldwide. With an unwavering commitment to excellence in journalism, our team is at the forefront of gathering, verifying, and presenting breaking news, in-depth analysis, and insightful reports on a wide range of topics. The TOI News Desk is your trusted source for staying informed and connected to the ever-evolving global landscape, ensuring that our readers are equipped with the latest developments that matter most." Read More

title: Three arrested in Anantapur for trade in illegal weapons
content: Two of the accused had been purchasing country-made guns and bullets at low prices from unidentified persons in the Gwalior–Morena regions for the past few years and illegally supplying them to other States, the District Superintendent of Police said

title: Watch: India-Pakistan, Middle East and more: wars and conflicts that headlined 2025
content: 2025 reminded the world that even long‑frozen fault lines can shift in an instant. From South Asia to the Middle East, from Africa to Eastern Europe, 2025 was a reminder that conflicts remain deeply interconnected each reshaping borders, societies, and futures.

title: In a historic first, BJP takes charge of Tripunithura municipality
content: Fifteen years after opening its account in Tripunithura, the BJP has elected P.L. Babu as its first chairperson of the municipality.

title: Mining mafia destroying Aravali hills, looting public resources: Surjewala
content: The Rajya Sabha MP charged that the "mining mafia" was openly looting public resources and destroying the Aravalli hills, with little concern for the environment

title: India’s economic growth continues to create career opportunities for youngsters, says Director of Indian Institute of Petroleum and Energy
content: Students who focus on developing skills and knowledge continuously in their respective courses would shine very well with the creation of lakhs of job opportunities in all sectors, the Director said

title: Man arrested for burning wife to death in Hyderabad’s Nallakunta; mother manages to save daughter
content: Venkatesh allegedly suspected his wife’s fidelity and even questioned the paternity of the daughter, said Nallakunta Police Inspector

title: CJI Surya Kant pitches for ‘multi-door courthouse’ for comprehensive dispute resolution
content: Mediation, which can reduce judicial pendency, is not a sign of the law’s weakness but its highest evolution, the CJI said

title: Sambhal court directs FIR against 13 cops for fake encounter; police say 'will challenge order'
content: The police personnel had allegedly arrested a man after an encounter in a robbery case, even though he was lodged in jail at the time

title: Tripura Assembly Speaker Biswa Bandhu Sen dies at 72
content: Sen was undergoing treatment at the hospital in the southern city after he suffered a massive cerebral stroke

title: Congress pays tribute to former PM Manmohan Singh on death anniversary
content: Congress President Mallikarjun Kharge said late Manmohan Singh reshaped the country’s economic path and expanded opportunities for millions through economic reforms and lifted millions out of poverty

title: Unnao rape case: Protest outside Delhi HC against suspension of Sengar's jail term
content: Women activists from the All India Democratic Women's Association participated in the protest along with activist Yogita Bhayana and the survivor’s mother

title: Congress councillor alleges Mayoral post sold for cash in Thrissur
content: Congress councillor Laly James alleges she was “denied” the Mayoral post due to a lack of funds and has made serious charges against the party leadership and the UDF candidate

title: Foundation stone laid for museum dedicated to former Karnataka CM N. Dharam Singh
content: KKRDB Chairperson Ajay Singh said that the museum aims to showcase the life, public service and contribution of Dharam Singh, who played a key role in the political and social development of the region

title: Air pollution: Delhi HC asks Centre to reply on plea to reduce GST on air purifiers
content: The court was hearing a PIL seeking directions to the central government to classify air purifiers as "medical devices"

title: BJP stages protest against hate speech Bill in Kalaburagi
content: The protesters said the BJP is not against curbing hate speech or maintaining communal harmony, but the Bill could be misused to harass social activists and opposition leaders under the pretext of maintaining public order

title: Two BJP workers killed in north Bengal; six people arrested, including Trinamool Booth president
content: Local Trinamool leaders and police officials said the deaths were due to an internal family feud and had no political motive

title: Naveen Patnaik hails security personnel for killing six Maoists in Odisha
content: Patnaik said that the State’s focused attention to expedite socio-economic development, road connectivity and pro-poor policies led to a steady decline in Maoist activities

title: Deepthy declines to stoke controversy ahead of mayoral election
content: Earlier, the KPCC general secretary had flagged violation of party guidelines in the selection of the mayoral candidate

title: Government’s reform trajectory will continue with even more vigour in coming times: PM Modi
content: PM Modi emphasises continued government reforms to enhance ‘Ease of Living’ and simplify processes for citizens and businesses

title: ‘Sarvam Maya’ movie review: Nivin Pauly rediscovers his mojo, lifts a middling ghost story
content: In Akhil Sathyan’s sophomore film ‘Sarvam Maya’, a sublime Nivin Pauly, with the help of Aju Varghese and Riya Shibu, propels a thin script

title: Tamil Nadu’s first Assembly session of 2026 to commence on January 20
content: The Speaker said the customs followed in the Assembly would not be altered and expressed hope that “the Governor would safeguard the dignity of the House.”

title: Kerala Congress leader booked for defamatory post against CM Pinarayi Vijayan
content: Police sources confirmed that one of the images circulated was created using artificial intelligence tools

title: CEO among three held for gang rape of woman IT firm manager in Udaipur
content: All three accused were arrested on Thursday (December 25) and produced before a court, which remanded them to four-day police custody

title: ED registers money laundering case against preacher Maulana Shamsul Huda Khan
content: The ED action is based on a First Information Report registered by the Uttar Pradesh Anti-Terrorism Squad (UP ATS).

title: Woman shot in Gurugram club after rejecting marriage proposal
content: The woman’s husband, from Najafgarh in Delhi, lodged a complaint stating that his wife Kalpana worked at a club in Gurugram and was shot by Tushar, a resident of Sangam Vihar in Delhi

title: Continue pollution control measures as western disturbance may worsen Delhi weather: Sirsa
content: He appeals to the people not to take out vehicles without valid Pollution Under Control Certificates and to avoid unnecessary travel

title: ‘Hobson’s choice’: Mirwaiz Umar Farooq drops ‘Hurriyat chairman’ title from X profile
content: For some time now, I was being pressed by the authorities to make changes to my X (formerly Twitter) handle as Hurriyat chairman, Mirwaiz Umar Farooq said

title: Four cops hurt in stone-pelting during anti-encroachment operation outside Jaipur mosque
content: Tensions erupted when police attempted to remove the iron railings as they encroached onto the road. The police had to resort to tear gas shells and use mild force to disperse the crowd, officials said.

title: Banned Yaba tablets worth ₹40 crore seized in Manipur, one held
content: Yaba tablet, known as "crazy medicine" in Thai, is a highly addictive drug, containing a mixture of methamphetamine and caffeine

title: Marathi cinema will not be crushed, says debut director Kshitij Patwardhan
content: Marathi film-maker’s post wins hearts, as he stands amid the rage for Dhurandhar and fights for slots

title: Grand procession to welcome Valmiki statue in Ballari
content: MLA Nara Bharath Reddy said several senior leaders and legislators of the Valmiki community would take part in the ceremony to unveil the statue

title: Delhi records 'very poor' air quality
content: The overall Air Quality Index (AQI) stood at 310; the air quality is likely be in the 'very poor' category for the next six days

title: The silent scourge strangling childhoods in Andhra Pradesh
content: Nearly 18 years since the Prohibition of Child Marriage Act, 2006 came into force, Andhra Pradesh continues to report a high incidence of the practice. Though the State has joined the Centre’s Bal Vivah-Mukt Bharat campaign, stakeholders engaged in eliminating the social evil highlight how poverty, lack of awareness and limited access to social support compel many families to see early marriage as a coping mechanism, finds P. Sujatha Varma

title: Chitradurga accident: Driver of sleeper bus  dies, increasing toll to seven
content: Mohammed Rafeek, 38, a native of Hulagur village, was driving the sleeper bus, which was hit by a container truck in Chitradurga district; Five passengers and the driver of the truck died at the spot

title: The long road to a water-secure future in Hyderabad
content: Hyderabad is chasing rain, literally. With the Hyderabad Metropolitan Water Supply & Sewerage Board rolling out citywide rainwater harvesting, the goal is to refill aquifers and curb dependence on tankers. But cultural apathy, poor upkeep and fragmented community action threaten to drain these efforts dry, finds B. Pradeep

title: BJP leader urges Uttarakhand Govt to remove video implying his involvement in Ankita Bhandari murder
content: Dushyant Kumar Gautam submitted a list of social media and news channels that he said made "false and malicious" allegations against him

title: Four killed and two injured in road accident in Andhra Pradesh’s Nandyal district
content: Police said four people travelling in the SUV died on the spot, while two others suffered serious injuries and were shifted to the hospital.

title: Five held for trying to sell 7-day-old baby for ₹6 lakh in Thane
content: The gang was paid ₹20,000 via UPI as token money, with the remaining balance of ₹5.8 lakh to be paid in cash, he said

title: 2025 in disasters: How earthquakes, cyclones, floods redefined the year
content: From deadly earthquakes in the Himalayas to catastrophic floods, cyclones, heatwaves and a rare volcanic eruption that disrupted India’s airspace, 2025 was marked by a relentless succession of natural disasters

title: Conventional bridge over Mir Alam Tank sinks hopes of lower footprint of connectivity
content: “The deepest region we encountered is nearly 12 metres and at other places it is nine metres. The pillars will be raised in the lake and there will be a circular junctions at either end allowing traffic to flow smoothly,” informed the official.

title: Twenty-first century solutions to snake bites
content: While a universal antivenom is still not available, it’s becoming more plausible as newer ‘nanobody’ methods show broad-spectrum protection in animal studies

title: Attacks on Christians contradict PM's message of harmony, visit to church: Gehlot
content: Symbolic gestures would not be enough, and strict legal action was required against those spreading hatred, says Congress leader Ashok Gehlot

title: Four arrested for pre-Christmas vandalism in Assam school
content: Miscreants who vandalised the school have been arrested. They entered the premises unlawfully, says a senior police official

title: Tightening the opium belt in Madhya Pradesh
content: The Madhya Pradesh High Court’s remark that a case against an 18-year-old man, arrested for illegal opium possession, was ‘rather suspicious’, led to the suspension of six police personnel. It also brought the focus back on Malwa region’s historic opium cultivation. Mehul Malpani reports on how farmers find themselves caught between drug smuggling and crackdowns by government agencies

title: IIT-Kanpur survey to assess extent of sand mining was illegal: Tamil Nadu government
content: ED had tasked the institute to assess the quantum of sand mined at 28 permitted sites during October-November 2023

title: This winter, Christmas festivities lift spirit of moribund Kashmir tourism
content: According to local hoteliers, occupancy of most hotels jumped from around 20% to around 70% on eve of Christmas
